Quick Glance at mesibo Chat API features

Refer to our developer documentation for in-depth details on how to quickly add any or all of these features in your own software, either by using our APIs or ready to use UI components

1-on-1 Messaging

Group Chat

Voice & Video Calls

Paired Chat

Chat Rooms

Hunt Groups

Anonymous Chat

Webhooks

Filtering and Moderation

Chatbot

Encryption

Build a Fantastic User Experience

Build your own UI or use our ready to use UI. In either case, mesibo makes it a breeze to add rich messaging and call features

  • Rich Messaging

    Send photos, voice and videos along with the simple text messages

  • Send Custom Data

    Share docs, media, location and any form of text or binary files or data buffers

  • Geotagging

    Geo tag messages and media

  • Typing Indicator

    Display real-time typing indicators while typing a message

  • Push Notification

    Increase engagement by sending real-time notification to users

  • Message Status

    Track status of every message in real-time, when it was delivered and when it was read (read receipt).

  • Presence Information

    Not only show users online status but also profile status, pictures and updates in real-time

  • Search Messages

    Search conversation across all the 1-on-1 and group chat

Voice & Video Calls

Call anywhere to anywhere

  • Enable voice chat between users
  • HD quality video calls when voice or text just isn't enough
  • Broadcast voice and video to your audience
  • Platform native SDKs for Android, iOS and Web

Bot Interface

Create chatbots for customer support or conversational commerce

Carrier Grade Infrastructure

Nearly 100% Uptime when you have no time for Downtime

We have deployed carrier-grade high availability infrastructure to build a fault tolerant system for our customers that scale and handle the ephemeral nature of operations and keep their application running smoothly with high performance and efficiency.

  • Geographically redundant infrastructure
  • Highly Scalable to support billions of calls and messages
  • Safe from DoS attacks, break-ins and data theft

Massively Scalable

Host over 1 Million+ Simultaneous Connections

Growing your app from a few users to millions is a very real possibility. Mesibo platform is highly scalable and tested to handle millions of users from day one. The platform is expandable on need basis to support even billions of subscribers and messages per day.

End-to-end Encryption

Security by default to keep your user data private and secure

End-to-end encryption (E2EE) is a secure communication mechanism that ensures only you and the person you're communicating with can read the messages. The end-to-end encryption is designed to defeat any attempts at surveillance or tampering because no third parties can decipher the data being communicated or stored, not even mesibo.
